所有类和接口

类
说明
ArtisanBaseBlock
Base interface for custom blocks, defining basic behaviors and properties for all custom blocks such as crops, machines, etc.
ArtisanBaseBlockState
Represents a specific state of a custom block, containing visual appearance and actual behavior definitions.
ArtisanBlastingRecipe
Blast-Furnace smelting recipe interface, extending the base ArtisanRecipe.
ArtisanBlastingRecipe.Builder
Builder interface for creating blast-furnace recipes.
ArtisanBlastingRecipe.BuilderFactory
 
ArtisanBlockBreakEvent
Event is called when a player breaks a custom block.
ArtisanBlockData
Data container representing an actual custom block instance in the world.
ArtisanBlockData.Builder
Builder interface for block data, used to gradually build custom block data instances
ArtisanBlockData.BuilderFactory
 
ArtisanBlockGUI
Abstract base class for custom block GUIs, implementing an interface bound to a block location.
ArtisanBlockLoseSupportEvent
Event is called when a custom block may drop due to losing support (e.g., the block below it is destroyed).
ArtisanBlockPlaceEvent
Event is called when a player places a custom block.
ArtisanBlockProtection
Block protection check service, used to verify player interaction permissions at specified locations.
ArtisanBlocks
Enum representing types of custom blocks.
ArtisanBlockStates
Enum representing types of custom block states.
ArtisanBlockStorage
Custom block data storage service, responsible for managing all placed custom block instances.
ArtisanCampfireRecipe
Campfire cooking recipe interface, extending the base ArtisanRecipe.
ArtisanCampfireRecipe.Builder
Builder interface for creating campfire recipes.
ArtisanCampfireRecipe.BuilderFactory

ArtisanCommonState.Builder

ArtisanCommonState.BuilderFactory

ArtisanItem

ArtisanItem.Builder
Builder interface for simple custom items.
ArtisanItem.ComplexBuilder
Builder interface for complex custom items, allowing full customization of item stack data.

ArtisanRecipe
